title: About
description: Delog, a GatsbyJS and Netlify CMS starter for Designers and Developers

home.title: Hi! I'm Rajkumar Davis
home.description: Hello, and welcome to my blog. I am Rajkumar Davis and the content in this blog is a reflection of my thoughts and experiences as I spend my day working on all things related to Java, Agile and Cloud. I am passionate about computer science and technologies and have worked in Java SE / Java EE technologies. Domain experience in the following areas: 	•	Cloud Technologies like Microservices, DevOps, Continuous Deployment, Containers 	•	Enterprise Computing technologies like, Java EE, JMS, Kafka. I am currently working as Product Architect – Technology at Tagit Mobile, Chennai (India). I love learning new technologies and sharing the most I can. I hope you will enjoy going through my blog and find some value.  :)
